survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees about the effectiveness and satisfaction with the current wellness programs offered by the company.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current wellness programs offered by your employer?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current wellness programs offered by your employer?

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture participation across different programs.

script.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Frequency of participation helps assess engagement levels.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in wellness programs?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the wellness programs?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that the wellness programs have positively impacted your overall well-being?
questions.client_notes: Assess perceived impact of wellness programs.

script.question_text: Do you feel that the wellness programs have positively impacted your overall well-being?

questions.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating in wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs
questions.client_notes: Identify common barriers to improve program accessibility.

script.question_text: Which of the following barriers prevent you from participating in wellness programs? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Programs not relevant to my needs

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's wellness programs to a colleague?
questions.client_notes: Net Promoter Score (NPS) style question to gauge advocacy.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the company's wellness programs to a colleague?

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather suggestions for new programs.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?

questions.question_text: Do you feel that the company adequately promotes its wellness programs?
answer_options: I was unaware of the programs

script.question_text: Do you feel that the company adequately promotes its wellness programs?
answer_options: I was unaware of the programs

questions.question_text: How important is it for you to have access to wellness programs at work?
questions.client_notes: Measure perceived importance of wellness programs.

script.question_text: How important is it for you to have access to wellness programs at work?
